title.narrative: Girls' Education Challenge (GEC) - help 1 million disadvantaged girls go to primary and secondary school

description.narrative: The Girls' Education Challenge will help up to a million of the world’s poorest girls to have an opportunity to improve their lives through education. The initiative calls on NGOs, charities and the private sector to find better ways of getting girls in school and ensuring they receive a quality of education to transform their future.
